alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 11:22PM EDT until May 09 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Fulton County in western Kentucky... Western Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... Southern Scott County in southeastern Missouri... New Madrid County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1021 PM CDT, strong winds out ahead of a line of thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oran to Canalou to near Malden, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sikeston, Charleston, Portageville, East Prairie, New Madrid, Lilbourn, Miner, Hunter-Dawson State Historic Site, Malden, Gideon, Morehouse, Bertrand, Parma, Morley, Matthews, Marston, Howardville, Risco, Canalou and Anniston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 1 and 14. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 32 and 80. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
